com.adidas.ui.adapters

Class FilterableAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
        • com.adidas.ui.adapters.AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>
          • com.adidas.ui.adapters.FilterableAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class FilterableAdapter<T>
extends AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>
implements android.widget.SectionIndexer
    Reusable adapter for the list which should support filtering and indexing Use the setFilterMatcher to provide the filtering Use the setViewPresenter to provide the list item view Use the setFilterResultComparator to provide list comparator

    • Field Summary
